name: VR Penny Arcade
description:
VR Penny Arcade brings 1910's era silent shorts found in a penny arcade into the medium of VR. There are five films, either uniquely adapted to VR or viewable in their original form. 

It's appropriate for high-end VR devices: Oculus, Vive, Index. The films come courtesy of the Library of Congress Archive (viewable on their YouTube channel) and are public domain.

VR Penny Arcade can be downloaded as a .rar file, or as individual files (your choice).
